00022 class TextFormat {

00037         typedef UINT8 TextAttr;
00038 
00043         //  Note: If you extend TextAttr, don't forget to increase the bit-vector in the
00044         //  class TextFormat.
00045         enum TextAttrValues {
00046             Normal          = 0,
00047             Underlined      = (1 << 0),
00048             Italic          = (1 << 1),
00049             Bold            = (1 << 2),
00050             Strikethrough   = (1 << 3)
00051         };

00061         };
